DOC.brief_summary: This randomize study examine effectiveness two type pregnancy test ( semi-quantitative test high sensitivity test ) identify continue pregnancy home various time point early medical abortion . The first test semi-quantitative panel test market brand name dBest ( AmeriTek , Seattle WA , USA ) . This urine-based , one-step kit use two previous study Vietnam ( 12 , 13 ) . The second test locally available urine dipstick ( Quickstick one-step hCG Pregnancy Test , Phamatech , San Diego , CA , USA ) . 1 . The investigator hypothesize 99 % SQPT 35 % HSPT correctly identify ongoing pregnancy day 14 . 2 . The investigator hypothesize 99 % SQPT 25 % HSPT correctly identify ongoing pregnancy day 7 . 3 . The investigator hypothesize 75 % SQPT 10 % HSPT correctly identify ongoing pregnancy day 4 .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Pregnancy Tests Assessment Tool Identify Continuing Pregnancy
